exercises.name: Slow Walking
exercises.description: Walking at a leisurely pace, around 2-2.5 mph (3-4 km/h), flat surface.
exercises.notes: Continuous activity; track by total duration in minutes.

exercises.name: Moderate Walking
exercises.description: Normal walking pace, around 3 mph (4.8 km/h), flat surface.
exercises.notes: Continuous activity; track by total duration in minutes.

exercises.name: Brisk Walking
exercises.description: Fast walking pace, around 4 mph (6.4 km/h), flat surface.
exercises.notes: Continuous activity; track by total duration in minutes.

exercises.name: Power Walking
exercises.description: Very fast walking, around 4.5-5 mph (7-8 km/h), with arm swing.
exercises.notes: Continuous activity; track by total duration in minutes.

exercises.name: Walking Uphill
exercises.description: Walking uphill at moderate pace, 5-10% grade.
exercises.notes: Continuous activity; higher burn due to incline.

exercises.name: Nordic Walking
exercises.description: Walking with poles for added upper body engagement.

exercises.name: Light Jogging
exercises.description: Slow running/jogging, around 5 mph (8 km/h or 12 min/mile).
exercises.notes: Continuous activity; track by total duration in minutes.

exercises.name: Moderate Running
exercises.description: Running at 6 mph (10 km/h or 10 min/mile).
exercises.notes: Continuous activity; track by total duration in minutes.

exercises.name: Brisk Running
exercises.description: Running at 7-8 mph (11-13 km/h or 8-9 min/mile).
exercises.notes: Continuous activity; track by total duration in minutes.

exercises.name: Fast Running
exercises.description: Running at 9-10 mph (14-16 km/h or 6-7 min/mile).
exercises.notes: Continuous activity; track by total duration in minutes.

exercises.name: Interval Running
exercises.description: Alternating fast and slow running intervals.

exercises.name: Trail Running
exercises.description: Running on uneven terrain or trails.
exercises.notes: Higher burn due to uneven surface and hills.

general_notes: These are continuous cardio activities, so track by total duration rather than sets/reps. Calorie coefficients are averages based on MET values from the Compendium of Physical Activities (e.g., walking 3-4 mph ~3.5-5 METs, running 5-10 mph ~8-13 METs). Actual burn varies by terrain, fitness level, and exact pace. Use app timer for duration.
